dct_title_s: Amazônia legal / mapa elaborado pelo Departamento de Cartografia (DECAR), Divisão de Mapeamento Temático e Especial (DIMTE)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by spot heights. Indian lands, ecological reserves, national parks, protected areas, native forest coverage and areas of anthropogenic impacts are located. Includes llocation map. Map shows administrative divisions, public works, roads and highways, railroads, and areas of importance. © IBGE.
dct_creator_sm: Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística
dct_publisher_sm: Rio de Janeiro : Brazil. Fundacao Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatistica (IBGE). Departamento de Cartografia. Divisao de Mapeamento Tematico e Especial, 1995.
dct_subject_sm: Indigenous peoples of South America—Amazon River Region—Maps
dcat_theme_sm: Indigenous peoples of South America—Amazon River Region—Maps
